name: Raw Fury #1
description:
Raw Fury #1 (ISSN 2327-6002, published by IS Press, Denver in conjunction with Flatlands Studio, Chicago.) is a hand-made 7.5" square, perfect-bound, 60 page, screen-printed, letterpresses, laser printed and photocopied 'zine on mixed paper stock with rounded corners, a gate-fold, and a signed Brooks Golden poster with 13 contributors in a numbered edition of 113 released on May Day 2013.

Raw Fury #1 is a luxury 'zine â€“ a ridiculously fancy publication with professional editorial standards that maintains a diy 'zine ethic. The content is a mix of interviews and images on graphic and street art 
on the theme of "your neck of the woods." Denver subjects and contributors are Mario Zoots, Heather Link, Tom Horne of Blackbook Gallery, agent m[i]le[s] of Institute of Sociometry, and Esther of Ladies Fancywork Society. Chicago subjects and contributors are Flatlands Studio, Eric Von Haynes, David Cuesta, Oscar Arriola, Narciso Carlos, Dred 88, and Tommy B of Stay Rad Skates.

Distribution will be to the finest 'zine emporiums in Denver, Chicago, Brooklyn, Baltimore, Melbourne and flatlandspress.bigcartel.com. 

Check back in June for store locations.

Free shipping!
